User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the TiffinTrack application.

billingStartDate.description: The custom start date for the user's monthly tiffin cycle.

phoneVerified.description: Indicates if the user's phone number has been verified.

TiffinOrder.title: TiffinOrder
TiffinOrder.description: Represents a single tiffin order for a specific user on a specific date.

date.description: The date of the tiffin order, stored as YYYY-MM-DD.

breakfast.description: Indicates whether breakfast was ordered for this date.

lunch.description: Indicates whether lunch was ordered for this date.

dinner.description: Indicates whether dinner was ordered for this date.

/users/{userId}/tiffinOrders/{orderId}.description: Stores tiffin orders for a specific user.
